TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManualResetEvent extends System.Threading.EventWaitHandle
Public NotInheritable Class ManualResetEvent Inherits EventWaitHandle
public ref class ManualResetEvent sealed : System::Threading::EventWaitHandle

summary.span: 告知一個以上的等候中執行緒已發生事件。

span.span: Notifies one or more waiting threads that an event has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，衍生自新類別。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, derives from the new class. A其作用相當於以建立。A is functionally equivalent to an created with . > [!NOTE] > 不同於類別類別會提供存取具名的系統同步處理事件。Unlike the class, the class provides access to named system synchronization events. 可讓執行緒信號與對方進行通訊。 allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 通常，此通訊是有關的工作的執行緒必須完成其他執行緒才能繼續。Typically, this communication concerns a task which one thread must complete before other threads can proceed. 執行緒開始其他之前必須完成的活動時執行緒繼續執行，它會呼叫放置`ManualResetEvent`未收到訊號的狀態。When a thread begins an activity that must complete before other threads proceed, it calls to put `ManualResetEvent` in the non-signaled state. 這個執行緒可以想成控制`ManualResetEvent`。This thread can be thought of as controlling the `ManualResetEvent`. 執行緒呼叫上`ManualResetEvent`會封鎖，等待訊號。Threads that call on the `ManualResetEvent` will block, awaiting the signal. 當控制執行緒完成的活動時，它會呼叫發出信號的等候中執行緒才能繼續。When the controlling thread completes the activity, it calls to signal that the waiting threads can proceed. 會釋放所有等候中執行緒。All waiting threads are released. 一旦收到信號，`ManualResetEvent`會保留已收到信號，直到手動重設為止。Once it has been signaled, `ManualResetEvent` remains signaled until it is manually reset. 也就是說，呼叫`WaitOne`立即傳回。That is, calls to `WaitOne` return immediately. 您可以控制的初始狀態`ManualResetEvent`將布林值傳遞至建構函式，`true`如果收到信號的初始狀態和`false`否則。You can control the initial state of a `ManualResetEvent` by passing a Boolean value to the constructor, `true` if the initial state is signaled and `false` otherwise. `ManualResetEvent` 也可與`static`和方法。`ManualResetEvent` can also be used with the `static` and methods. 如需執行緒的同步處理機制的詳細資訊，請參閱[ManualResetEvent 和 ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md)概念文件。For more information about thread synchronization mechanisms, see [ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md) in the conceptual documentation. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何的運作方式。The following example demonstrates how works. 此範例會啟動具有信號的狀態 (也就是`false`傳遞至建構函式)。The example starts with a in the unsignaled state (that is, `false` is passed to the constructor). 此範例會建立三個執行緒，每個哪些區塊在藉由呼叫其方法。The example creates three threads, each of which blocks on the by calling its method. 當使用者按**Enter**索引鍵，範例會呼叫方法，這個方法會釋放所有的三個執行緒。When the user presses the **Enter** key, the example calls the method, which releases all three threads. 這和行為的類別，這會釋放執行緒一一次之後每個版本, 的自動重設。Contrast this with the behavior of the class, which releases threads one at a time, resetting automatically after each release. 按下**Enter**金鑰再次示範會保留在收到信號的狀態，直到其方法呼叫： 此範例會啟動兩個的多個執行緒。Pressing the **Enter** key again demonstrates that the remains in the signaled state until its method is called: The example starts two more threads. 這些執行緒不會封鎖它們呼叫時方法，但改為執行到完成為止。These threads do not block when they call the method, but instead run to completion. 按下**Enter**金鑰一次會造成呼叫範例方法，並啟動一個更多的執行緒，它會封鎖呼叫時，如果。Pressing the **Enter** key again causes the example to call the method and to start one more thread, which blocks when it calls . 按下**Enter**其中一個索引鍵為最後一次呼叫釋放最後一個執行緒，並在程式結束。Pressing the **Enter** key one final time calls to release the last thread, and the program ends. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ManualResetEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ManualResetEvent/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ManualResetEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ManualResetEvent/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ManualResetEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ManualResetEvent/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 這個類別是安全執行緒。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool initialState) cil managed

param.name: initialState
param.span: 如果初始狀態設定為信號狀態，為 ；初始狀態設定為非信號狀態則為 。

span.span: to set the initial state signaled; to set the initial state to nonsignaled.

summary.span: 使用布林值 (Boolean) 來初始化 類別的新執行個體，指出初始狀態是否設定為信號狀態。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a Boolean value indicating whether to set the initial state to signaled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果初始狀態收到信號 (亦即，如果它由傳遞`true`如`initialState`)，等候的執行緒不會封鎖。If the initial state of a is signaled (that is, if it is created by passing `true` for `initialState`), threads that wait on the do not block. 如果未收到訊號的初始狀態，執行緒會封鎖直到方法呼叫。If the initial state is nonsignaled, threads block until the method is called.
